Question.Subject: Ebay rating question. Can someone please explain?
Question.Content:
Hey I have an ebay account and have purchased 7 items with it and have received 7 positive feedback. I purchased from 3 different sellers. However the number next to my account name only says 4. Why is this? Could someone please explain how this number is calculated and what it means? I thought that that was the number of total items purchased or sold.
My ebay user name is classy_yet_crazy if you want to look it up to see what I mean.
Thanks for your help everyone :)
Question.ChosenAnswer: You only count 1 feedback from each Seller Even if you Buy 10 items from one seller and he sends you 10 feedback, your feedback will only increase by 1

Answer.Content: You only count 1 feedback from each Seller Even if you Buy 10 items from one seller and he sends you 10 feedback, your feedback will only increase by 1
